pages.text: A hard, volcanic mineral which safekeeps the trophies of ancient magma.$(br2)Findings described as: cataclysmic, ancient, indestructible.

Deep within the foundations of the world, the most ancient artifacts become embedded in the tempered crystal of our planet. Striving through surreal spans of time, only the most sturdy of artifacts can find their way to the depths and survive the intense pressures and heat of the earth's molten heart - a credit to their value, or likely the hubris of the adventurers who carried them there.
